name: weblioSentences
preset_css: .keyword { font-weight: bold } b, strong { font-weight: bold; } li .keyword, li b, li strong { color:#DC143C } .box1 { background: transparent; background-color: transparent }
preset_javascript: var sentences = document.getElementsByTagName('li');for (var i = 0; i < sentences.length; i++) {if (sentences[i].innerText.toLowerCase().includes('tanaka corpus')) {sentences[i].setAttribute('style', 'display: none !important');}} if (document.body.innerText.includes('に一致する英語例文が見つかりませんでした')) {window.close();}

name: alc
preset_javascript: setTimeout(() => {if (document.body.innerText.includes('に該当する項目は見つかりませんでした')) window.close();}, 500);

name: linguee
preset_javascript: let noresults = document.getElementsByClassName('noresults'); if (noresults.length) { window.close() }; let headers = document.getElementsByTagName('h1'); let foundExt = false; for (let i = 0; i < headers.length; i++) { if (headers[i].innerText.toLowerCase().includes('external sources')) { foundExt = true; break; }} if (foundExt === true) { let dict = document.getElementsByClassName('dict_headline_for_0');dict[0].click(); }

name: reverso
preset_javascript: window.confirm = null; if (document.getElementById('no-results') && document.getElementById('no-results').innerText.toLowerCase().includes("' not found in context")) window.close();

name: hyogen
preset_javascript: var css = '@media screen and (max-width:870px){#wrap{min-height:100%;width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-left:0 solid #d4d4d4;border-right:0 solid #d4d4d4;position:relative;overflow:hidden}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){#foot{text-align:center;border-top:1px solid #d4d4d4;background:#fff;padding-top:5px}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){#header-ad{margin-left:0;margin-top:10px}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){#header-banner{float:none}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){#content{width:100%;margin:0 auto;margin-bottom:10px;margin-right:0;font-size:140%;float:left}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){#content2{padding:0;width:100%;margin-right:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){#sideWrap{width:100%;float:none;text-align:center}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.kensaku-box{padding:5px 0 10px 10px}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.sidebar-box1{margin-left:-1px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;border-color:#d4d4d4;font-size:90%;padding:5px 0 5px 0;width:100%}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.sidebar-box2{font-size:90%;padding:5px 0 5px 0;width:100%}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.col_midasi1{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.input_link{pointer-events:none;cursor:default}.input_link a:link{color:#999}.input_link a:visited{color:#999}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.sp_msg:before{content:"※現在、投稿はＰＣからのみ行えます。";color:red}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.hyogen_midasi1{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.kanjo_sentence{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.kankaku_sentence{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.chara_sentence{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.food_sentence{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.scene_sentence{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.hiyu_sentence{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.hiyu-link{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.contact_sentence{margin:50px 0 0 0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.message1{margin:30px 10px 0 10px;font-size:90%}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.message2{margin:15px 10px 0 10px;font-size:90%}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.tango-link{margin-left:0}}@media screen and (max-width:870px){.input1{width:100%}}';var cssEl = document.createElement('style');cssEl.innerText = css;document.head.appendChild(cssEl);var word = decodeURIComponent(window.location.href).replace(/[A-Za-z:/.]/gmi, '');if (word) {if (word.endsWith('する')) {window.location = 'https://collocation.hyogen.info/word/' + word.substring(0, word.length - 2);};if (word.endsWith('される')) {window.location = 'https://collocation.hyogen.info/word/' + word.substring(0, word.length - 3);};var wordRe = new RegExp(word,'g');var text = document.body.innerHTML;text = text.replace(wordRe, '' + word + '');document.body.innerHTML = text;};
